data.partBlankContent: The dance recital provided much needed relief from the tedium of the talent show. Michelle w__ the st__ dancer, and s__ leapt a__ twirled wi__ graceful eleg____. She d__ not app___ to b_ held ba__ by t__ confines o_ her phys____ strength. What others could only imagine she accomplished with ease.
data.fullContent: The dance recital provided much needed relief from the tedium of the talent show. Michelle was the step dancer, and she leapt and twirled with graceful elegance. She did not appear to be held back by the confines of her physical strength. What others could only imagine she accomplished with ease.
data.answer: 舞蹈独奏会从无聊的才艺表演中解脱了出来。米歇尔跳的是踢踏舞，她能优雅地跳起任何旋转的舞步。她似乎没有被她的体力所限制。其他人只能想象她轻松完成的事情。
